sentences.sContent: He thrust his hand into his coat pocket.
sentences.sCn: 他把手插进大衣口袋里。

sentences.sContent: There must be another way into the cave.
sentences.sCn: 一定有其他的路可以进入洞穴。

sentences.sContent: Sue got back into bed and pulled the quilt over her head.
sentences.sCn: 休回到床上，拉过被子蒙住头。

sentences.sContent: I’ve got to go into town this morning.

trans.tranCn: 进， 到…里； 关于， 有关
trans.tranOther: to the inside or inner part of a container, place, area etc
